actions.text: Motion to table amendment SA 2813 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 63 - 32. Record Vote Number: 335.

Amendment SA 2813 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S11382-11383; text: CR S11383) To ensure that no funds made available under this Act shall be used to carry out any activity relating to the design or construction of the America's Wetland Center in Lake Charles, Louisiana, until the date on which the Secretary, in consultation with the Administrator of the Federal Emergency Management Agency and the State of Louisiana, certifies to Congress that all residents of the State of Louisiana who were displaced as a result of Hurricane Katrina or Rita in 2005 are no longer living in temporary housing.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 2813 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 63 - 32. Record Vote Number: 335.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2813 proposed by Senator Coburn.

purpose: To ensure that no funds made available under this Act shall be used to carry out any activity relating to the design or construction of the America's Wetland Center in Lake Charles, Louisiana, until the date on which the Secretary, in consultation with the Administrator of the Federal Emergency Management Agency and the State of Louisiana, certifies to Congress that all residents of the State of Louisiana who were displaced as a result of Hurricane Katrina or Rita in 2005 are no longer living in temporary housing.
